All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Action interface for defining the actions to be performed on SmartLight devices.
Automation
Automation class represents a system to manage and execute a series of actions based on a series of triggers for various light controllers.
ColorAction
ColorAction class represents an action that sets the color of a SmartLight.
Compiler
 
Deserializer<T extends SmartDevice>
Deserializer interface defines a method for deserializing a JSON strings into a list of objects of type T.
Dev
 
DimmingAction
DimmingAction class represents an action that sets the brightness of a SmartLight.
HttpsGetRequest<T extends SmartDevice>
HttpsGetRequest class handles HTTP GET requests and deserializes the JSON resposne into a list of SmartDevice objects.
HttpsPostRequest<T extends SmartDevice>
HttpsPostRequest class handles HTTP POST requests.
HttpsPutRequest<T extends SmartDevice>
HttpsPutRequest class handles HTTP PUT requests and sends an updated SmartDevice object to the endpoint.
HttpsRequest
Abstract class HttpsRequest represents a base class for HTTPS requests.
HueController
Provides methods for controlling and interacting with Philips Hue smart lights.
HueLight
Represenst a HueLight object that implements the SmartLight interface.
HueLight.Color
 
HueLight.Dimming
 
HueLight.MetaData
 
HueLight.On
 
HueLightDeserializer
HueLightDeserializer class provides an implementation of the Deserializer interface.
LightController
LightController interface for controlling and interacting with SmartLight devices.
Main
 
OnAction
OnAction class represents an action that turns a SmartLight on or off.
SmartDevice
SmartDevice interface for representing a generic IoT device.
SmartLight
SmartLight is an interface representing a specific type of SmartDevice: a smart light.
SSLHelper
SSLHelper class is a utility class that disables SSL certificate verification for the application.
TimeTrigger
TimeTrigger class represents a time-based trigger.
Trigger
Trigger interface for defining conditions to trigger specific actions.
UdpRequest<T extends SmartDevice>
UdpRequest class handles sending UDP requests containing a SmartDevice object as payload.
WiZController
Provides methods for controlling and interacting with WiZ smart lights.
WiZLight
Represents a WiZLight object that implements the SmartLight interface.
WiZLight.Params
